catalog_info.title: Topics in Marine Biology
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Permission of instructor. Course note: Course is designed for advanced undergraduate students only and graduate students.
catalog_info.description: This seminar explores the fragility and resilience of marine life and ecosystems in the face of perturbations such as habitat fragmentation, land use change, anthropogenic climate change, pollution, alien species, and unsustainable fishing practices.
